fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 Culture on a budget in the Dordogne. Crystal France (0870 888 0233) have cut the cost of a week's stay at the Pech Pinet, a rural villa near Sarlat, by 20 per cent for selected dates in April or May. The cost is £77 per person based on five sharing including ferry for car and passengers. Under £200 If you book a city break in one of 17 Travelscene Eurostar destinations between now and end June you will be entitlted to a free day trip to Lille or Brussels to be taken during July and August. Travelscene city breaks start from £124 for a one night stay in Paris whilst day trips to Lille or Brussels normally cost £69 and £86 respectively. City break to Brussels with Virgin Travelstore (01293 747367). Two nights at the two star Saint Nicolas Hotel with buffet breakfast for £159 and travel by Eurostar from Ashford or Waterloo up until 30 June. Base yourself at the two-star Hostellerie les Perce-Neige close to the Loire and you could visit the world famous gardens of the Chateau de Villandry. Easter prices are from £162 for two nights half board with Hoverspeed channel crossings. VFB Holidays (01242 240310). Explore Burgundy with family and friends based in 'Au Chardonnay', an immaculate converted winery which sleeps up to 14. Prices from £121 (if 10 sharing) including ferry crossings for two cars. Just France (020 8780 4480). Under £500 Crete at Eastertime for families staying at the five star Aldemar Knossos Royal Village in Hersonissos. Extensive childrens facilities will make the most of seven nights departing 15 April from Gatwick for £485 (£285 children up to 14). Breakfast and transfers included. Argo Holidays (0870 066 7070). Manchester departures £19 extra. Money no object? Then a night for two at the fashionable Hotel Le Tremoille is yours between 22 March and 6 April, seconds from the Champs Elysees in Paris, for €685, including champagne, a half day of beauty treatments and breakfast. Telephone 00 331 56 52 14 00. Under £700 Save £55 a night at the Trianon Old Naples hotel in Florida over Easter. Seven night package, including flights to Miami, accommodation and car hire is from £637 between 13 and 25 April with Trailfinders (020 7937 5400). Qantas Holidays (020 8222 9119) have seven nights in Koh Samui, Thailand, from 28 April for £625 (must be booked by end March). Flights from Heathrow to Bangkok, seven nights accommodation with breakfast at the Impiana Resort Samui and all transfers. Bliss with spa specialists Erna Low (020 7594 0290) at Le Mas Candille in the medieval village Mougins, near Cannes. Two nights B&B accommodation for £640 includes beauty treatments, dinner and flights. Up to end April. · Prices are per person.
